name: MemGltch64
description:
MemGltch64 is an extremely constrained top-down "adventure."  

It features some strange internal terrain / biome generation.  

Upon starting the game you are required to enter a word (or alphanumeric string) to seed the generation.  The “game” can be confusing at first, but generally you cannot ascend or descend steep inclines, so if you cannot find your way onto a block, try seeing if there is a ramp nearby.  

Failing that, consider using one of your precious ladders or ropes!

Controls: 

  • Esc -> Quit
  • Arrow Keys -> Move
  • Z -> Use Rope
  • X -> Use Ladder

Note: There is no goal, this is mostly a continuation of an earlier experiment. (MemGltch86)
